name: Tiling Installation
Bathrooms & Toilets
Correct tiles used and tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Acoustics to toilets & bathrooms are installed and have no gaps between cork sheets
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Wall substrate straight, signed off by MC, and ready for installation. (insert notes for remediation if required)
Wall tiles set out to match floor grout lines or as per drawings
Grout nominated is the correct colur (Mapei ultracolour plus) and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Silicone water marks are cleaned off tiles thoroughly and room left to builder for hand over
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed

Correct tiles used and tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Acoustics to kitchen are installed and have no gaps between cork sheets
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Grout nominated is the correct colur (Mapei ultracolour plus) and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
